about_the_game:
It's time to raise the temperature and fly to a new dimension of baking! With Chef: Pizza & Baked Goods, it is finally possible to put pineapple on pizza! Are you interested in other kinds of cultural crimes? Don't worry, because we also added several new Templates you can use to create (or ruin) many other popular recipes!

Content

  • 10 unique Templates, allowing you to create new custom recipes: Pizza, Calzone, Deep Dish Pizza, Quiche, Wrap, Tacos, Baked Dumplings, Fried Dumplings, Omelette, and Open Sandwich.
  • A new Skill Tree dedicated to Baked Goods, which includes 17 new Skills for your chefs.
  • 20 tasty pre-made Recipes to inspire you.
  • 17 new tasty ingredients.
  • 41 new Decorations, with several variants, to put even more stuff in your restaurants.

It's time to raise the temperature and fly to a new dimension of baking! With Chef: Pizza & Baked Goods, it is finally possible to put pineapple on pizza! Are you interested in other kinds of cultural crimes? Don't worry, because we also added several new Templates you can use to create (or ruin) many other popular recipes!

Content

  • A new Skill Tree dedicated to Baked Goods, which includes 17 new Skills for your chefs.

name: Chef: Pizza & Baked Goods

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista SP1+ (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+ @ 3.2GHz
  • Memory: 3000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 630, AMD Radeon HD6570, or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7 920 @ 2.7 GHz, AMD Phenom II 945 @ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960, AMD Radeon R9 295, or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 MB available space

short_description: It's time to raise the temperature and fly to a new dimension of baking! With Chef: Pizza & Baked Goods, it is finally possible to put pineapple on pizza!
supported_languages: English, Italian, Russian, French, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Turkish, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
